generated_description: cambridge co., ltd. joetsu office, legally known as hashimoto medical instruments co., ltd., is a company based in kashiwazaki, niigata prefecture. the company specializes in the sale, rental, and repair of welfare and medical equipment, as well as home care support services. it operates various facilities including small multipurpose homes, day services, and residential care homes. also provides home renovation services and conducts training for care staff. the company is committed to creating livable environments for the elderly and promoting a high-quality, long-term society.
